mapper.insert: insert into Aircraft (id, Type_Catalog, Type_Of_Aircraft, Aircraft_Description, Registered_Number, Create_Time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeCatalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeOfAircraft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aircraftDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeredNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into Aircraft (Type_Catalog, Type_Of_Aircraft, Aircraft_Description, Registered_Number) values (#{typeCatalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeOfAircraft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aircraftDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeredNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update Aircraft set Type_Catalog = #{typeCatalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Type_Of_Aircraft = #{typeOfAircraft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Aircraft_Description = #{aircraftDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Registered_Number = #{registeredNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Create_Time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, Type_Catalog, Type_Of_Aircraft, Aircraft_Description, Registered_Number, Create_Time from Aircraft where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, Type_Catalog, Type_Of_Aircraft, Aircraft_Description, Registered_Number, Create_Time from Aircraft
select id, Type_Catalog, Type_Of_Aircraft, Aircraft_Description, Registered_Number, Create_Time from Aircraft where Registered_Number = #{registeredNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, Type_Catalog, Type_Of_Aircraft, Aircraft_Description, Registered_Number, Create_Time from Aircraft where Type_Catalog = #{Type_Catalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Type_Of_Aircraft = #{Type_Of_Aircraft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
